goal: Open Notepad using app_open {name:'notepad.exe'}. Wait 1 second using wait {seconds:1}. Focus its window with app_focus {title:'Notepad'}. Type the text ECOSYSTEM READY and press Enter using type {text:'ECOSYSTEM READY', enter:true}. Press hotkey ctrl+s using hotkey {combo:'ctrl+s'}. Type C:\bots\ecosys\reports\ECOSYSTEM_READY.txt and press Enter using type {text:'C:\bots\ecosys\reports\ECOSYSTEM_READY.txt', enter:true}. Wait 1 second using wait {seconds:1}. Take a desktop screenshot to C:\bots\ecosys\reports\screens\ecosystem_ready2.png using screenshot {path:'C:\bots\ecosys\reports\screens\ecosystem_ready2.png'}. Close Notepad using app_close {name:'notepad.exe'}. Stop when done.
